channel.title: AI on wubigo
channel.description: Recent content in AI on wubigo

item.title: 面部生物识别学习笔记
item.description: Once the face is detected, the AI then provides the information on its size, pose, and location The state-of-the-art face detection software uses pattern detection technology. No personal data is collected, and no images are stored. 人脸检测基本方法 #Import Libraries #Import Classifier for Face and Eye Detection #Convert Image to Grayscale #Give coordinates to detect face and eyes location from ROI #Webcam setup for Face Detection #When everything is done, release the capture
